Hearthstone Update and "Korfearon Reads"

07 Jan 2016
Hearthstone Update

The deadline to sign up for the tournament is this Saturday. Sometime on Sunday I will create the bracket and all players will be required to give me their decks and entry fee. You can see a preview of the bracket below along with a link to the information page.
Bracket
Information

Other events

My goal with this tournament is to lay the foundation for more events. The ones that immediately came to mind (due to being WoW based) were duel tournaments and pet battle tournaments. Unfortunately, these are hard to spectate and may not turn out to be very fun. The idea is to create an atmosphere in our guild where people can take part in things outside of just the normal dungeon/raid/PvP groups. I'd like to hear the ideas you guys may have. Message me through normal communication channels if you...

Hearthstone Tournament and updates

22 Dec 2015
Hearthstone Info
I am happy to announce the start of a new guild Hearthstone tournament series. The tournament date is still TBD but will occur sometime in the middle of January. All guild members (and their friends) are encouraged to sign up. You can find more info by clicking on the Hearthstone banner at the top of the page or going to this link. Contact Brisp/Bigchap if you'd like to participate.
Raid Update
We've made solid progress on Mythic given our limited raid schedule. We are currently 3/13 Mythic and very close to 4/13. We are always looking to add more raiders to our roster. Message one of the people on the about or one of the officers in game.
Various Site Additions
I've also taken some time to make some more updates to the website. Most notably, I have added a stream status section to the right...

Valor is Back

23 Oct 2015

Prepare yourself for 6.2.3 if you are looking to get a maximum of 10 more ilvls out from your current gear.

You can get up 4875 Valor per week. Which means you can give +10 ilvls to 9 of your items in one week.

  • You get 300 Valor per Mythic dungeon (2400 for all 8)
  • 500 for the weekly Event quest (excluding Pet Battle)
  • 100 Valor for your first random Heroic (700 total)
  • 750 for completing all of HFC LFR, 300 for completing all of BRF LFR, and 225 for completing all of HM LFR

Assuming you don’t do LFR (because fuck LFR), that will give you 3600 Valor or 6 items in one week. That’s a huge lift and will help us push through Mythic content faster.

Also, Mythic warforged can be as high as ilvl 725.

All of that to say that everybody should be trying...
